website_summaries.verdict: While Brown’s may seem a little pricey on the surface, this is a nutrient-rich mix sporting a huge number of different ingredients that are universally loved by parrots, making it as delectable as it is wholesome.
pros: Sunflower seeds, safflower seeds, peanuts, raisins, almonds, and banana are the first 6 ingredients
Mix includes a wide variety of tasty bits including peppers, walnuts, and dates
cons: This parrot food features a high amount of sunflower seeds and peanuts, which are fairly high in fat

customer_reviews.title: ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My birds are medium and large birds. They do not like the majority of this item since it has tiny seeds and other items that they don't eat. I have to supplement with other products to make it palatable for them. I may not order this item in future.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Not for finicky eaters
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of variety here, but it's heavy on sunflower seeds. Not a great choice for picky eaters...our Umbrella Cockatoo mostly picked out sunflower seeds, peanuts, and pasta wheels. Switching to a more nutritious pellet, and adding a few pasta wheels and peanuts for interest.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: My flock loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great for my whole flock not to much waste which is nice
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the bird food. This is supposed to be for a large bird. There are tiny pieces of seeds. Wheel macaroni. Hardly any large nut or pieces of dried fruit. I will not be purchasing this food through Amazon again also will be looking for a new company to purchase food for my bird
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Granger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Our cockatoo loves it! Very good product. She ate it all!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Great mix of items for all large parrots
customer_reviews.text: I feed a Macaw and two African Greys with this. The last two bags haven't had many shelled nuts that the Macaw loves and there are too many rd chili peppers. But other than that they all love this blend
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My feathered friend appears to enjoy this brand more than the previous ones. We'll stick to this one until he desires a change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: This was a bag full of grain, not happy with this one at all. Birds just threw it everywhere.I will stick with the big bites and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: charles truman

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered that same food a few months ago and it was perfect nice chunky style just like the bag says ordered the same kind and nothing but sunflower seeds. So frustrating to pay so much money to get sunflower seeds 😡.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: back sucks
customer_reviews.text: the food is great but this is the 2nd one I have bought and resealble back sucks I have had to put everything into multiple smaller bags
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good...like people quality. A little expensive..but she is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: F.M. Brown's has lost quality control of their product.
customer_reviews.text: The mix was for small parrots instead of large parrots. It was nothing like the photo of the nuts, fruits, etc. I have bought in the past and the was correct. Something has happened to their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It has everything my bird likes and the price is not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my Ecliptis
customer_reviews.text: Excellent food has the perfect blend of vegetables and protein. I would prefer to see more fruit in the mix though. I would definitely buy more products from this seller in the future. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Art Winsor

customer_reviews.title: but still better than Sunburst as to the amount of larger nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs more larger product for Macaws, but still better than Sunburst as to the amount of larger nuts than Sunburst
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves it and i save money. Win, Win
customer_reviews.text: We order this often. Has a mix of everything our McCaw loves it. Saves me aloy vs. Buying at a pet store
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G. Ballew III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had several times for years. One of my birds favorites
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive. Chewy.com is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Good parrot food but have to stop buying. The price keeps going higher and higher
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Parrot Pleaser!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo loves this mix! Been buying it for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: Zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: My picky macaw loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bird food mix for large macaws. My bird loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: A Member of the Family
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand I have always bought for my 22 years old conure.He seems to enjoy this brand because it has the variety that he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Smith

customer_reviews.title: package
customer_reviews.text: excellent product but the package was hard to open & does not reseal
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: My macaw likes the food but all the walnuts are ...
customer_reviews.text: My macaw likes the food but all the walnuts are already cracked open and empty. Just a bunch of walnut shells.
customer_reviews.author: Ted & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: He loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My Macaw loves this!! It has alot more of the large nuts that he likes! The best parrot food I've found!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Elardi

customer_reviews.title: Our birds love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect food for our African gray and severe macaw. They love it
customer_reviews.author: laal13

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Our B&G won't eat anything but this food.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: What's better than that
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves it, and I can get it delivered to my door. What's better than that?
customer_reviews.author: kate

product_meta.title: F.M. Brown's Tropical Carnival Gourmet Bird Food for Parrots, African Greys, and Conures Under 13", Probiotics for Digestive Health, Vitamin-Nutrient Fortified Daily Diet
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Tropical| Size:5-lb bagBrown’s Tropical Carnival Gourmet Large Hookbill Food for Parrots, Cockatoos and Macaws Over 13" is a natural, vitamin-nutrient-fortified daily diet. It's a food and treat, all-in-one. Our super premium gourmet food is specifically formulated to help Large Hookbills thrive. We've jam-packed it with a mix of fruits, nuts, vegetables and wholesome seeds and grains. Tropical Carnival includes natural preservatives to ensure freshness. Omega Fatty Acids, antioxidants and beneficial bacteria help support good digestion. Your Large Hookbills will find Tropical Carnival simply irresistible.
feature_bullets: Vitamin-Nutrient-Fortified: Specifically Formulated For The Daily Dietary Needs Of Large Hookbills
Support Good Digestion: Omega Fatty Acids And Beneficial Bacteria Help Stimulate Good Digestion So Your Pet Can Get The Most Out Of Our Nutrient-Rich Ingredients
Over 30 Unique Gourmet Ingredients: Fruits, Vegetables, Nuts And More Combine To Ensure Your Bird Receives The Complex Carbs, Vitamins, Minerals, And Fiber They Need
Immune System Support: Farm Fresh Veggies Contain Antioxidants That Help Maintain A Healthy Immune System
Relieve Cage Boredom: Crunchy Pine Nuts, Walnuts, Peanuts, Almonds And Cashews Are Nutritional Powerhouses And Removing Their Shells Encourages Activity
